articles.title: Paul Scholes reveals that Jesse Lingard told him that Man United's dressing room is a 'DISASTER' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Ralf Rangnick appeared to take a swipe at Jesse Lingard when he was questioned about the atmosphere in Manchester United's dressing room. The Red Devils lost 3-1 to Arsenal on Saturday.
articles.content:
Paul Scholes revealed Jesse Lingard has told him the Manchester United dressing room is 'a disaster' as Ralf Rangnick admitted their hopes of a top four finish are over.
